channel.title: Server source that has SQL?
channel.description:
May somebody please point me in the right direction towards a source that has MySQL integrated into it.
I would appreciate it if someone would help me out by giving me a link if possible, or if its an old source the name is fine.
I ahve already tried SQLscape and I am having trouble with it, if i have no other choice, I will figure the SQLscape source again.
Maybe you guys can help me solve the SQLscape server problem:
It connects to the database and everything, but it says the following: [code] ERROR LOADING (ItemList) : Illegal operation on empty result set.[/code]
Thankyou very much for helping me guys, Chris Daden

item.title: Server source that has SQL?
item.dc:creator: @ChrisDaden ChrisDaden
item.description:
@ChrisDaden wrote:

yes, on my local host.

I am a first time poster due to never registering and just browsing. But, I am not a new coder. So, please anyone who helps me please donâ€™t treat me like i am not a coder. I am just like yourselves.

To answer your question, of course I do.

Thanks for your reply!
